item.title: Average US long-term mortgage rate falls to the lowest level of the year at 6.15%
item.description: The average rate on a 30-year U.S. mortgage fell to its lowest level of 2025 this week, an encouraging sign for prospective home buyers

item.title: US applications for jobless benefits fell below 200,000 last week
item.description: Fewer Americans applied for unemployment benefits last week as layoffs remain low despite a weakening labor market

item.description: By most measures, 2025 was a rough year for those who care about freedom of the press
